name: Adria Airways
text_review: My first trip on this airline. A319 from Bucharest to Munich on Feb. 6, 2019 (on behalf of Lufthansa). Very nice experience. Clean airplane, inside and out. Very professional pilots and crew. The aircraft interior was well maintained. The flight was on-time, without incident and the landing was flawlessly soft. Overall, a great experience.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Delay of flight in Ljubljana for about an hour. Very responsible stewards . Good food, but limited drink offer.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: The flight from Frankfurt to Lubiana was on time. Small airplane so all hand luggage had to be stored separately but well organized. the food in the business class was good.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: love it the service is the best. and the foods are pretty normal price..........I m pretty surprised how good was the service.......fly with them

name: Adria Airways
text_review: The airline cancelled our connecting flight and offered one option - an 8 hour bus ride. Our one hour flight turned into an incredibly slow 12 hour journey. An absolutely deplorable experience. Horrible horrible way to start a holiday.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: From Ljubljana airport we flew on time. We had enough time to move from the flight from Brussels. The cabin crew was very polite. Sitting is a bit uncomfortable. Refreshment is served on the plane, but it is paid additionally. Only water is free. We arrived in Skopje a little earlier than planned. The flight was very quiet and pleasant....
quotes: Another quiet flight with Adria Airways

name: Adria Airways
text_review: A short flight.Enjoyable to get to my destination.this airline fly throughout Europe.No complaints with my flight.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: AA has the highest prices for their services but even than they just don't provide even minimum. The service is equal to some low cost carrier. But LC like Ryan Easy thet don't charge you so much as Adria. Better to start at Zagreb, Venice or Trieste airport. Adria has to much delays and they combine some flights. So you'll...

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
- direct flight Ljubljana - Sarajevo replaced with round (like bus) trip over Pristina with
free seat (like in low cost bus companies). Same time ticket price stay high. Under this condition Its faster to reach destination by car then with Adria Airways round trip.
-Slovenian company where cabin cure do not speak Slovenian language
- return flight was canceled...
quotes: High cost airlines with poore service

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
I think Adria Airways is one of the worst airlines I've flown with. The staff is OK, but the fleet is too old, you must ride a bus to the plane, they are picking up cabin baggage since there is no space on board, no food service, not cheap at all and the delays and cancelations are quite often.
I...
quotes: Sad that I must write such review

name: Adria Airways
text_review: On the relation LJU - PRG - LJU i normally manny time use ADRIA AIRWAYS Airline. It is very appropriate Airline company for this direction. The flight takes normally little more then 1 hour in each direction. Flights are more tiomes in the week, normally two times per day. Flights are operating by Canadair planes. Also the price is good....

name: Adria Airways
text_review: From Brussels airport we flew on the time. We flew very quiet and without any turbulence enjoying the view over the clouds. Refreshments are served on the airplane, but they need to be paid additionally. Only water was served free of charge. We arrived in Ljubljana 15 minutes earlier than anticipated time. Very pleasant flight.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: From Ljubljana airport we flew on the time. We flew very peacefully enjoying the view over the clouds. Refreshments are served on the airplane, but they need to be paid additionally. We arrived in Brussels 15 minutes earlier than anticipated time. Very pleasant and peaceful flight

name: Adria Airways
text_review: From Skopje airport we flew with a little delay. We flew peacefully and without any inconvenience. Refreshments are served on the aircraft, but they need to be paid additionally. We arrived in Ljubljana with a small delay of 10 minutes, but quite enough to arrive in time for the next flight. Very nice flight.
quotes: Flight fast, peacefully and without any inconvenience.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Really nothing bad or great to say about this airline. Our flight was on time, the plane was clean, and the crew was nice. The aircraft was on the smaller size and they will check most carry on bags..

name: Adria Airways
text_review: I was flying from Ljubljana to Amsterdam this summer when my flight got delayed. I would miss my connecting flight. I went to the Adria desk to see what could be done. The man at the desk was rude and unhelpful. Said I just had to figure it out myself. But I booked through them. Finally after a lot of...
quotes: Ground staff is rude but flight is good

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
A short and comfortable flight.
Small room in the overhead for carry on, but passengers very polite and gave trolleys to attendant on boarding and got them coming out of the ramp.
All in all OK. Small detail is the pay for coffee in a regluar flight (it was part of an Austrian regular ticket).For a short flight is not...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: I had a pleasant flight on board though food needs to be paid. Basic complimentary drinks served on board. Most passengers were unaware that food & drinks are payable. Mobile check in was easy, bags drop off at the airport was fuss free. Highly recommended for online check in as check in line at the airport was long. Small plane...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Lufthansa flight operated by Adria Airways. First time I flew with this airline and I was pleasantly surprised. On time, so nice staff, really comfortable seats. Will try to flight with them in the future.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: My flight from Moscow to Paris was cancelled. Not only it was really hard and expensive to reach the customer service to get the new itinerary; but it has also been a real headache to deal with them in order to get the monetary compensation every customer flying in European territory is legally entitled to get according to the Regulation...
quotes: PhD in "The worst customer service in the world"

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Overpriced flights from Manchester to Ljubljan. Therefore I catch a bus to Luton and fly with Wizz Air..Inconvenient but savd hundreds of pounds.They do not want to compete with Low Cost Airlines.I believe it's the way they do buisness in the Balkans.They would rather lose your business.Do not purchase there high price ticket.Abd do nit fly with them.I believe that...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Had to visit Ljubljana and Skopje for business and had the opportunity to fly with Adria Airways. Would recommend them as a way to visit their destinations, the planes are new, flights were all on time, service was excellent with the staff being friendly.

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
These Slovenians have been taken on to fly the OTP/MUC route on behalf of LH with an old ( 19 year plus ) A319 ex AF 138 seats - not very comfortable , but with full LH catering and a friendly cabin crew .
Make no mistake this is not LH at its best but as a fill in only...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Adria cancels regularly flights, almost on a daily basis and considering their small size, cancellations of up to 5 flights a day seems to be a whole lot. Since several months passengers are now faced with this cancellations and Problem is that no LH Group carrier operates to LJU, which means that out of their main markets Germany, Austria and...
quotes: Adria is a no go Carrier

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
This is not my first time traveling.
But the evening did not feel good, the seat was very uncomfortable, and no food was provided.
The flight will not take long, hopefully the next time there will be another way to change seats and serve a better way.

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
The 1 hour flight passed smoothly. Nice crew Who gave my son a little Lego present. Nice fresh little sandwich.
Just the space between the rows is extremely tight.

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
Checked into the airport and the flight delay last minutes. Tried to seek information and help on flight, but the passenger services very bad. Does not offer any assistance or even make effort to help. Helpless wait for the flight to resume. the compensation is bag of meagre foods.
While waiting, it is observed many flights are delay with little...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: They cancelled the flight, no communication whatsoever, had to wait at the airport for hours. Finally, they picked us Hamburg-Frankfurt-Zurich-Ljubljana - like a bus!

name: Adria Airways
text_review: It was not my first time traveling with adria. Appart from the fact that the seats are very uncomfortable, they don‚Äôt give you any food. They lost my baggage. They don‚Äôt answer my emails and they don‚Äôt answer the phone. They take no responsibility. Yeah it‚Äôs cheaper that‚Äôs why i choose it but it‚Äôs not worth it.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Caught a flight from Zurich to Sarajevo with a connecting flight in Ljubljana. Everything went well and smooth and arrived at my destination on time without any delays. The airline hostess's were very professional and polite. As Adria Airways has the quickest routes from Western Europe to the Balkans there pricing is rather expensive.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: They cancelled the flight 6 days ago with no reason explained, and it was difficult to call into the service line to rearrange the flight. The returned flight was delayed, and one of our baggage was delayed. The lost and found office told us that Adria does not provide any means to inform and deliver the baggage, so we had...
quotes: Cancelled flight, delayed flight, and delayed baggage - never again

name: Adria Airways
text_review: I fly with Adria a lot due to work requirements. One example of a very unpleasant experience was flight to Prague recently. My flight was scheduled for departure at 17:05, arrived at the airport at 16:00. Around the time of scheduled departure we got first info about the delay and that next information will be given in next 30 minutes....
quotes: Better tae a car or drive to Zagreb and fly with Croatia Airlines - it will be faster

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
In 14 days, I had three flights with Adria. One cansled (Z√ºrich), one delayed for three hours (M√ºnchen) I lost connection flight, and third Frankfurt Ljubljana, they land also in Z√ºrich, without announsmment???? Delay for two hours and half.
There is a joke in Slovenia, that since Germans bought Adria, it's bigger chance to win lotery, than to arrive on...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: I travelled Vienna-Pristina return. Check in was efficient, seats comfy and space sufficient. Offered water on the way out and a bun with water on the way back. It was possible to pay for a sandwich. I'd use Adria again, it was fine, no problem.

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
DON'T FLY ADRIA
This company should really be ashamed of themselves. Not only do they treat their customers really bad, they are even lying to them. They canceled two flights on one day so I lost a complete day on a WEEKEND trip. After months of waiting for a response they finally promised me a compensation as granted by European...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Flights went as expected. Very small planes, and as noted in previous reviews, one can not bring rolling suitcases on to the plane. They are checked at the door and retrieved on the tarmac prior to boarding the buses to the terminal. Only water and coffee/tea served on the one hour flights. Soft drinks for purchase. Avoid seat # 13--no...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: short flight from VIE - LJU (back again on the same day); starting from C-Gates somewhere at the end of the Vienna Airport and bus boarding; plane was a Bombardier Canadair Regional Jet which I like; seats still with ashtrays; only water included - everything else has to be paid; some kind of WLAN onboard: first flight: did not work;...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Oh yes! Only 8K allowed for a carryon. Even if you are allowed a bag on connecting flight if you did not declare a bag to begin with, you get a ‚Ç¨75 charge. So, delegates: we do not check bags because we are generally allowed 30 lbs but got snagged here. Maybe check a bag so you can get it...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Horrible service. NEVER fly with them again. they did not give me enough vouchers for a proper dinner (was only able to buy a salad (just veggies)).

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Its happened again and again, that Adria Airways cancelled fly. Airplane simply didnt come from ljubljana. Without any explanation to passenger. This is really bottom of bottom. Why they offer the fly if they are not in the position to do it. CLOSE your door!

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Daily connection (direct) Brussels to Ljubljana. Comfortable smaller aircraft (Canadian make). Pleasant service. Ljubljana airport very well appointed and relaxed place through which to fly. Good connections through Slovenia.
quotes: For someone who hates flying this was an agreable experience

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
We had connection flight from Ljubljana to Munich and they gave us 2 boarding passes (for the second flight as well with Lufthansa). They didn't sit us together (my husband and I on our honeymoon). They say there is no room left in the airplane, which is B.S, we couldn't even check in online with this company.
It seems they...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: We had been on holiday in Slovenia and were flying back to Manchester via Frankfurt. Our flight from Ljubljana was doomed from the start after a bird strike on take off. The pilot had to do an emergency stop and the plane was checked and the brakes cooled down before we could take off again, this time successfully. However this...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Flight was ok, but it was charter, so departure and arrival time were late night or early morning, garage in Ljubljana costs 50 Euro per week

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
The flight is short, which is a good thing when flying on a small aircraft. Room in all dimensions is limited, so I'm happy when there are only 2 adjacent seats and my wife is next to me.
No frills means no meals, no coffee, one cup of water and you carry on bag needs to be left at the...
quotes: water rations & leave your bag at the door

name: Adria Airways
text_review: We were overbooked and couldn't catch our flight....we signed papers at the airport confirming that we will get 550 euros reimbursement for this mistake within 7 days...well guess what, after 2 months, 3 messages, one call and one online message, will received...NOTHING ! This company is a fraud !

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
Booked on a 1-hour direct flight, business class. One week prior got notification that "due to technical reasons" the flight would make a short stop in Warsaw, Poland - no deplaning required - then arrive in Prague (3 hour total time from etd to eta). Instead it turned out to be a 4 hour trip!!
And the "technical" reason was...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: They cancel the flight without any compensation... No hotel, no food or lounge entrance, no proper explanation. And the worst part is ghat this is happenkng very very often... Try to avoid this airline as much as you can!!!

name: Adria Airways
text_review: My general impression js that this airline is cancelling every sexond flight... Most probably if they are not full enoigh they just cancel. No compensation, no proper explanation, no hotel, no food... African standards from an EU based airline.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Very good direct flight from Manchester to the capital of Slovenia. Comfortable seats with ample legroom on the short haul flight with courteous staff and easy check-in. Snacks and drinks available in-flight and one of the smoothest landings. Only complaint was the early return flight time but you can't have everything.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: This was an efficient service that was on time. Short flight. Check in very quick. Went by bus to the aircraft but very efficient. Received free water on the short flight and could have purchased other items.

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
We had not heard of this airline, but it was the only one we could use to get a direct flight!! It ran 15 minutes late each way, but it was a good service and happy with airline.
We booked emergency exit seats, but leg room looked quite adequate anyway. Would use again!!

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Nothing wrong with the short flight, except that the flight on the day we had booked was cancelled with no reason being given, so we had to change ouir travel plans, which added to our cost.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Small airplanes, usually on the last corner of big airports. But good service and nice staff. Would recommend.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Great seats, nice stuff, I enjoyed the captain¬¥s comments and the kindness of young stewards. Also the check in was correct and quick.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: My first return flight with adria was on time both ways. Seating comfortable and staff eficient and attentive.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: For a business meeting I had booked an early morning flight from D√ºsseldorf to Ljubljana. The flight was cancelled at the very last minute. No alternatives were offered. There is no service desk for Adria in D√ºsseldorf, just the general AHS desk. There you only get a claim form and the suggestion to call Adria yourself. Another person in the...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: It is conviniet to fly from small airports. The plane was clean and the personal very kind. The flight was on time and everything went smooth. We can only recpmend to use this airline

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Budget airline. All fine and good. If you want food & drinks you pay. offers OnAir entertainment - this did not work at all. if something is offered it has to work.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: We got a little delay to start the flight, but it was ok, very calm. My one complaint is that the money for it was good, and we don't have anything to eat (for free).
quotes: Good company that needs some improvements

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
Short flight, efficient service, this is Slovenia's main airline with good links to many cities in the region.
In-flight meal was an extra charge.
Departed on time, with minimal fuss.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Somewhat basic service, offering a soft drink or water with a snack, didn't expect more, from a small airline. Staff was kind and helpful.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: This flight left 1 hour late, but the pilot explained that Zurich was experiencing high cross-winds which left some runways inoperable. They advised anyone who had connections to make to let the flight attendants know. Then they served chocolates. During the flight they also served snacks & drinks & chocolate again when we had to circle the airport for 20...

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
Flight was cancelled without any reason given and comms was awful. An email simply saying flight cancelled and no info on whether we were transferred to another flight.
Having rung a very expensive phone number we managed to get a different flight. An indirect flight from Slovenia to Czech Republic! A 3hr journey instead of a 50 mins journey.
Flight...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Short routes,limited competition and limited availability flights have turned this airline into one of the most expensive ailines in the world. Next time you have to go to Eslovenia give yourself an extra amount of time and try either an award or a regional airport.
quotes: The very expensive airline to Ljubljana

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
Flight was organized by travel agency which means that there are only tourists on board. As a frequent flyer I can tell there is a major difference between charter and regular scheduled flights.
Check-in and security check went smooth. Seats on this flight were already assigned by agency, rearrangement was not possible. Boarding went very fast, and we take off...
quotes: Charter flight from Brnik SVN to Monastir TUN and back 8 days later

name: Adria Airways
text_review: We had great experience with Adria airways. The flight and service was amazing. They waited for us as the plane was late from Paris. Also they made sure that we were comfortable with everything. Great suprise when the plane waited for our luggage as the time was only 10 min between flights due to delay from Paris. Thank you Adria...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: I will NEVER EVER in my life fly with this company again. Thank you for making my trip to a beautiful destination such a nightmare. I bought my DIRECT tickets in February to travel in August, well in advance. On the way there (Prague-Ljubljana) they changed my flight and instead of having a convenient 1 hour flight it took us...

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
This is my first place i am going to Slovenia, Ljubljana is my first city. This flight is so wonderful, all the flight attendant is so Beautiful and very interesting. with the slogan Taking of to the Future.
Hvala

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Flight was on time. Service pleasant and plane was satisfactory. The food was OK. the fact that we could fly directly to Ljubljana was a big advantage, recommended.
quotes: efficient, kind service and on time

name: Adria Airways
text_review: all flights in my opinion are the same, but for this one ship is very good, and the flight attendant's beauty is very interesting to me, and the service is very satisfying

name: Adria Airways
text_review: The flights were very good. The staff were friendly and helpful and we were pretty much on time. Its a small airline but seem to be very good.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Flew from Amsterdam to Skopje via Ljubljana. Flight from Amsterdam was operated by Carpatair. Great cabin crew, friendly and attentive. Comfortable flight. Delayed departure for various reasons out with airline control. Only had 10 minutes to transfer between flights at Ljubljana. It is achievable all things running as normal. Connecting flight was waiting for me. Transfer at Ljubljana was extremely...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Made me pay twice for my luggage. Ending up paying EUR 500 for a return ticket. Arrogant attitude when I tried to explain I already paid for the luggage.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Overall great flight. Confortable and Space for legs. Was on time, great boarding and good overall services

name: Adria Airways
text_review: I wasn't able to do online check-in (not sure if this is even available) and there are no automated check-ins available (Ljubljana airport), so be prepared to arrive at least 1.5-2 hours ahead to stand in line to get your boarding pass. Short flight (about 50 minutes) so only water was served. Overhead bins on this flight are too small...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: All in one an ok fligt. We traveled with one child. There was no delay. Because of small plane, they use a bus to enter not a corridor. The cabin crew was ok. The flight took only an hour, so we did not use any service on the board.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: My wife and I traveled for almost a month in Eastern Europe so we accumulated a bunch more luggage on the way. We tried to upgrade to business class so we didn‚Äôt have to worry about baggage weight. In order to upgrade on Adria we had to join a strange club(5$) and then wait for a response from the airline....

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
We travel with charter line. No delay for Glasgow. We had delay back. Not just our flight.
The servis: sendwich, the staff were ok (no good , no bad).

name: Adria Airways
text_review: They made everything seamless. Right from check-in, to baggage pick up - everything went really well. Since the flight was only a couple of hours long, we couldn't enjoy more on the aircraft. I strongly recommend this airline and would be more than happy to be their customer in the future.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Transit from Vienna to Budapest- 35 min flight, fast , comfortable and high service level in the small Bombardier CRJ900. Friendly and welcoming staff. Seats more comfortable than in many smaller Airbus or Boeing medium size planes. A lot of space for the legs.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: 2 hour delay - no explanation and no apology. Missed connecting flight from Amsterdam to Manchester, now being rerouted from Amsterdam to Belfast to Manchester meaning that a journey that should have taken five hours will now take twelve. Utter and complete waste of a day. Will never use this appalling company ever again, and it will take more than...
quotes: The worst service I have ever encountered...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Using my Airmiles I was booked from Tirana to Ljubljana then Ljubljana to Warsaw. The flight from Tirana to Ljubljana was an hour and 15 min and there was no free food except free water inflight.Both my flights with them were uneventful. The crew were older ladies unlike Asian airlines were crew members are young.The leg space in between seats...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: On time, comfortable, not overly crowded like a domestic US carrier. A nice snack] included. Enjoy your travels.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Flight was delayed during bad weather, when we tried to order something they didn‚Äôt have it. Stuff was polite

name: Adria Airways
text_review: For the price you pay, you only get small cup of water. Crew is not very polite, but otherwise flight was good and on time

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
The flight itself is a short one, so there are no snacks, ALTHOUGH several years ago, it was normal to get a snack even on a short flight, when flying a normal, not a low-budget airline. So, the price remained the same or got higher, but the service has been cut to basic.
On the return flight, there was a...
quotes: Ok, but still room for improvement

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Very professional staff, as usual with this air company. Im always satisfied. Also at the airport they are very nice and willing to help. As Im very tall, they offered me a seat next to the exit.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Booked a direct flight months in advance and 12 days before while on vacation received an email that my flight was cancelled and I should call my TA to re-book. Firstly I made original reservation online myself. Secondly I spent 2 hours trying every possible phone number and email address but to no avail. This was nerve wracking as I...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Is this possibly the crapiest airway in Europe? In 30 years of business tracel I never ever experienced such a misery. For the second time in a row (!) our travel group has experienced a delay of several hours in Ljubljana! Not one hour but 4-5h !!! The excuse: Late incomimg airplane. The worst was, no communication except new infos...
quotes: Is this the crapiest airway is Europe?

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
This was a last minute connection to get back to the uk for family emergency.
A perfect flight only 1/2 full. Everything ran smoothly and on time and was competitively priced.
quotes: Perfect first leg back to UK

name: Adria Airways
text_review: The flight was a bit delayed but only around ten minutes so the pilot caught up the delay. The staff was as usual friendly, I just miss to get for free more than a glass of water on board.

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
I booked a round trip from Prague to Ljubljana several weeks before. For my wife, I bought a ticket via a Czech travel agency and for me (I needed extra luggage) I booked directly via Adria. Adria cancelled the flight 15 days prior to the departure without giving any explanation. Now the story takes two different turns.
The travel agency...

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
We had a pleasent flight in a very clean and comfortable airplane. The staff on bord was very friendly. The flight was calm as the weather was Beautiful. The view over the Alps is amazing!
The flight was more expensive than others we had in Europe, but it might even be that this should be the normap Prices as everybody...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Stewards are friendly and responsive. And perhaps this is the best of flight and airline performance. The food board is more likely to say that it is served - as in Austrian Airlines - chopsticks or chocolate sticks of choice. They have no identity - everything inside the plane was branded with the Austrian Airlines logo. Probably because they serve...
quotes: Good staff in maybe a mediocre airline

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Our flight from the US got delayed and caused us to miss the Adria flight to Slovenia. I tried talking with Adria via phone. It required holding for about 20 minutes - keep in mind this is at international long distance rates - and then the agent said she would cancel our flight. I asked for the cancellation number and...

name: Adria Airways
text_review: Check in and baggage experience was perfect. We had no difficulty with the staff on the flight or the flight itself. During the flight to Paris an announcement to say returning to Ljubljana as there were technical difficulties. We only had to wait about half an hour or so when we got on another flight and were on our way...

name: Adria Airways
text_review:
Being pricy compared to other Balkan airlines, I didn't find any value for money:
Flying Adria Airways is exactly like flying any other Balkan (or European) airline (low or high priced).
Catering selection and -prices are OK.
Distance between seats = leg space is the same as on most other airlines.
Flight attendants were nice and attentive.

name: Adria Airways
text_review: The flight was delayed as 80% of all the flights from Zurich that evening. Service on board standard. The problem is when you land at Ljubljana airport, where they treat you as a number. You enter the airport building at one end, walk along all the building to the opposit end and then you have to walk back half of...
quotes: Flight OK, but airport service at LJU very poor

name: Adria Airways
text_review: The check-in was very slowly. We fly on time and the flight was smooth. Food and drinks were Ok. Crew was polite.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: I was catching a flight from Athens to Amsterdam but I had a previous connection flight which was delayed but made it to Athens 30 min before my next flight was taking off. My luggage was going directly to Amsterdam. The Aegean Ambassador instead of leading me to my connecting flight when I got of my previous flight, lead me...
quotes: Had to pay for my ticket double and more without being my fault

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: When booking our flights from Crete to Dubrovnik, there was no place for a middle name, so I didn‚Äôt put one in. Since then I have found out that travel documents have to match passports exactly. I was told you have to put first and middle names in the ‚Äúfirst name‚Äù box. This error cost 20 euros each for Aegean...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
I have been using Aegean Airlines for the last 8 years. As an airline company, is really one of the best. Flight attendants and desk staff are always kind and never rude!
But the prices for economy class are honestly overpriced even if you book your tickets 5-7 months earlier. In the past it was better and I can not...
quotes: Once upon a time you were one of the best

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: I travel with aegean every two months. I take flights from beirut to athens and then athens to practically everywhere. Aegean has the most friendly staff among all the airlines i‚Äô ve Travelled with. Their service is incomparable. You really feel like their are taking care of you. Pilots are the best you barely feel the landings. Even people working...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
Best airline , best service , staff is amazing.
We living in Indonesia we use Aegean airline Santorini to Athens
Snacks, napkin,water , provide ( btw the best pasteli snack)
Most important flight attendants is amazing.
I would certainly recommend this airline

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
Amazing service, on time take off and even earlier landing than anticipated!! The food was quite good for aeroplane food and the flight attendants were extremely polite!!
Although I'm a low budget traveller and I am forced to usually travel with low cost companies...Aegean's service totally worths every last cent!

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: I flew with them in numerous occasions, sometimes they operate flights for other companies from star alliance. I paid around 580 euros for one way in business class. There is no Lounge close to the gates, and you have to go to another building in the international section so you have to pass through passport control, the scanning, and walk...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
First time I have used this airline and i wasn't disappointed.
The ground staff at the check in, very efficient and although the flight was at 4.50am !!! the staff was at their desk before the 3 hours requirement for international flights.
Leg space not very comfortable but it was OK.The service during the flight was good and the snack...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: consider super ok for this airline, hazel free and great transport.. staff are good will not try make thing too hard for you. cool and chill

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Aegean Airlines is a very safe and sincere airlines. It takes care of the customers and the service before and during the flight is well above the average comparing with other airlines these days. In case you have a connection flight in short time there is the so colled "connection ambassador" who makes your life much easier and you catch...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: What a fantastic flight. 4 hours door to door with AEGEAN Airlines, amazing service, incredibly cheap price, great selection of food and drinks included and the crew came round at least 4 times. Extremely friendly and helpful, could not have asked for more ( well possibly inflight entertainment but for the cost - happy to do without). Midnight flight time...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
This was the first time I'd flown with Aegean, with a flight via Athens to Corfu, and I couldn't have been more impressed. This was as BA used to be.
A hot meal and drinks were provided throughout the flight, and being complimentary the service was quick. The check in, facilities and crew were all fantastic.
Highly recommended.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: The flight left on time and we had hot meal although it was not a very long flight. The crew was very friendly & well trained. Although there is not enough space for the legs of tall people in the economy Class, I think that I was more comfortable than in the economy class of other airlines.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
Flights On time.
Staff was great.
We used this company several times. Is very nice and looks safe.
Totally recomend it especially for travel in Greece.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
worst experience of my entire life. No leg space if you are taller than a dwarf and lost my luggage at destination
Had to wait for delivery 48h after flight and missed two days of my holidays. TERRIBLE !!!
category_labels: Europe| Economy| Athens - Canton of Geneva

There were...
quotes: Aegean Ground Crew at Athens on 23 Jan 2019

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
We're seasoned and frequent world travelers. We used this crappy airline for the first time for our trip flight from Athens to Rome on Jan. 12. 2019.
What a HORRIBLE airline! They will charge you for EVERYTHING! I'm surprised the don't charge you for using the bathroom too! No free food or even a glass of water!!! They charge you...
quotes: BROKEN LUGGAGE & THEY REFUSE TO RECTIFY SITUATION

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: The cabin was nice and clean, the onboard staff was very nice and the service was good. The ticket prices is well affordable, and you get a free in-flight meal as well. I haven't flown much, but very good experience from Aegean Airlines.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: My flight was fine, the crew aboard were great. It's when I get off the plane and find a bag missing that the trouble starts. After 5 days, the airport couldn't locate the bag, so I was instructed to follow up with the airline itself. I sent 3 emails over 5 days trying to submit my lost baggage form, giving...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: For Greeks it's a tradition to fly with local companies. For visitors must become one. Besides the smile, boarding procedure, calm Greek music, service and more, there is a unique asset that makes Aegean the best choice to fly. LANDING. Aegean pilots fly but mostly land their planes as no one else does. If you experience this ones, you will...
quotes: You can not have a better choice to travel to/from Greece.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Flight was on time, crew was friendly, food was good. Always a nice experience to fly with Aegean Airlines.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Aegean really know how to treat their passengers. From the airport to the plane and back out again, they are far ahead of some of the other options between London and Athens. Service on board is fantastic. Food and drinks service throughout which is something of a luxury these days. Staff are all well presented and seem experienced. The planes...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: One of the best regional airlines. I use aegean most for domestic flights, but also for this trip i was satisfied as usual. On time and professional staff.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
For many years the Europe's best regional airline... after many miles with Aegean i can understand the reason, friendly staff, excellent meals, skilled pilots . keep up the good job, more and more awards to come...
trust them!

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: I have travelled with many airlines and Aegean Airlines is recommended. Always on time , best pilots & efficient staff.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
Flew from Tel Aviv to Rome with stopover in Athens. Only had one hour for connection in Athens but it went smoothly and checked luggage made it to destination.
Average legroom and good service. They serve food and drinks on 2 hour flight. For inflight entertainment you need to download their app.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: The team was very friendly and welcoming. Great service on a very short flight. Yes I would fly with Aegean again

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: In August I bought a return ticket from Rhodes to Madrid via Athens for today, the 18 January 209.For personal reasons I needed to be in Athens earlier and didn't do the Rhodes Athens part of the trip. Instead I showed up at the airport in Athens for the flight to Madrid,always on the 18th, only to find out that...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: I actually flew Aegean Airlines on multiple occasions. They are my preferred method of travel between each of the Aegean Islands. The food on board is decent, flights are relatively short and the flight attendants are pretty top notch as well. Most importantly, the pilots do this many times every single day and your flight can be trusted in good...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: We flew with Aegean airlines during our trip to rome. The seats were spacious, we didn't travel with our legs pressed against our chest, the prices were reasonable (the same price with other cheaper airline company), the coffee was tasty, and alongside the hot cheese pie we ate and the melomakarono, we reached Rome smiling. On the occasion of new...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: I fly with Aegean mostly for Athens to Thessaloniki and backwards and I have also visited Cyprus a couple of times flying with Aegean as well. It is "safety first" and customers' service oriented company and I would trust it for any flight anywhere.
quotes: Everything in order, convenient and value for money

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Departure - right on time! And I just love it, when they offer to check even your hand luggage for free, as they did!

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
It is the first time for me to fly with Aegean, our flight was from Sofia to Amman via Athens .
Pros:
- On time take-off.
- Good food service for a short flight.
- Friendly staff.
- Aircraft is clean.
Cons:
- Changing seats not allowed although there were plenty of empty seats.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: It was my first time to fly Aegean. Good value for a full service airline. I enjoyed this flight because it flew from Hanover which was much less stressful since it's not a particularly crowded airport. The flight was slightly late because of a minor security issue on the previous flight but the winds were favorable so we still arrived...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: we missed the second flight because the first flight was late for an hour but airlines booked us another flight the next day and booked us a room in a near by hotel till next day.
quotes: first flight was so good but return flight was horrible and landling was super bad and we delayed for an hour

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: I had a good experience with Agean Airlines. It was a 3.5 hours flight and it was nice to get a meal and beverages served as a matter of course. Both are included in the ticket price. Friendly onboard staff and departure and arrival was very smooth.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Extremely polite staff, great (free) food, free wine if chosen, trouble-free flight, nice and smooth landing, definitely recommended airline.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
We have used this airline in the past on our trips to the Greek Islands and will undoubtedly use it again.
We are satisfied, overall, with the service. However, the seating configuration is less than optimal. Small, crowded seating arrangement makes even a short flight uncomfortable for the passengers.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: This company is perfect for travelling with little kids . I wil choose again Aegean Airlines when i will travel to Europe.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: We flew from Madrid to Cyprus by way of Athens with a very short lay over between flights. I had broken my toe in Seville so I had to ask for a wheel chair in the airport. Everything went well except for one little glitch. In Athens we landed away from the gates so they had to use a power...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
Excellent service with friendly and helpful cabin crew. They served hot food in a 2-hour flight in contrast to the most airlines that would serve only a sandwich in that case.
I highly recommend it and I prefer it for my travels mostly.
quotes: Excellent airline that serves hot food in long flights in contrast to other airlines

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
My first experience with Aegean was two years ago and I was gladly surprised by the quality of the flight. For that reason I started booking with Aegean a few flights this last year, and it has been consistently good. Modern aircrafts, very clean, attentive crew and very good check-in service at the airports and luggage handling.
The only thing...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Everything was fine. Timing was punctual and the staff is always very nice and helpful. We enjoyed the new in flight intranet.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: great flight. the staff has been very helpful. very comfort flight. food and refreshments offered during the flight.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: We had 3 different flights with Aegean Air - this being our longest. All flights were on time and the check-in process was easy. Staff were very pleasant. I would fly with them again.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Very good trip.Nice service.The flight was on time.The customer service (check-in,care helpfulness) is also very good.I recommend this airline to everyone.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: The best airline company ever! We had a great flight with excellent service and safety! The only negative thing I can mention is the smelly toilets. If they take care of the cleanliness of the toilets they will truly be the best!!!
quotes: No worries when you fly with Aegean Airlines!

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: A321 on service, morning flight!Everything went very smoothly.Great check in and take off but inflight service was even better!Very attentive and polite staff delivering excellence and taking the airline to the top!We were served breakfast-a kind of cheese pie which was hot and delicious, a traditional greek sweet and coffee and beverages!They have even added a kind of new wifi...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Very good service at the boarding and punctuality of landing. Helpful staff. The prices are reasonable

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Aegean airlines is the best air company I have ever used, concerning both national and international flights. The aircrafts are always big, the sits comfortable with enough leg space... Even when the flights are full, you feel comfortable. Food and beverages are served in every flight, even for the shortest ones there is always coffee/ tee and a snack. There...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
I can say this airline is in the top when it comes about comparing it with other similar ones.
Although we did not take a long flight, we were pleased with the services.
First of all, we received food and drinks during the flight with no extra charge. This thing is rarely happening for all the economical flights.
Moreover,we felt...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: They will easily tell you the flight is overbooked and push you to another flight causing you delays and inconvenience. We have experienced this and our luggage got lost on our way to Cairo. Their customer service is by far the worst, can't reach them. They would say you will get a free ticket compensation but you will not be...
quotes: Can't contact them for help, always overbooked

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Easy check in, boarding, free snack and coffee or tea. The plane was old with propellers but it's a very short distance for anything fancier. I had a sleep even if I was close to the wing.
quotes: It could not be better for such distance

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
The price of luggage check in is ‚Ç¨30 when you check in online, and ‚Ç¨45 when you check in at the airport.
Conveniently for the airline you are not always prompted to check in your luggage when you check-in online resulting an automatic overcharge at the airport.
Not sure why they are allowed to charge different amounts online and at...
quotes: Can‚Äôt trust the website or app with check-in

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
First We fly from tlv to athens. After that we had a connection flight to amsterdam. the crew members welcomed us with a pomegranate as a present.
Both flights were on time.The crew members were kind. The both flights were excellent. The served meal was very good. We had a great flights.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Try to get Aegean flight where possible when coming to Greece. Just a better experience than Ryanair and only other carrier to do direct flights. They give you food, staff are pleasant and genuine and it‚Äôs just a more pleasant way to make this trip.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: At Helsinki airport it is NOT allowed to take with you thin laptop backpack to aircraft with your carry-on bag. The thin laptop backpack is considered as carry-on bag. ONLY laptop case is allowed. Be aware of that because it says different rules Aegean's web-site than the rules they follow at Helsinki check-in. I had to take my laptop in...
quotes: Thin laptop backpack considered as carry-on bag! üò°

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: This flight flew from Gatwick to Manchester and on to Crete. We checked in at 6.30am and went straight to waiting area after security and found the flight board advising a 2 hour delay. This eventually turned into a 2hour 35 minutes delay. We bought refreshments whilst waiting and were offered no allowance for doing so. Only when the Manchester...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Being used on flying with low-cost airlines, I was more than content with my first-time trip with Aegean, to and from Cairo. The flight was on-time, the flight attendants helpful and the cabin food menu varied.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: I use to fly with Aegean cause I know, when I book, that the service is perfect the crew is very kind,I have information for the weather,the duration of the flightand finally a good meal .I recomend Aegean for European flights.The price is average.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: My family and I were very satisfied flying from Athens to Paris with Aegean Airlines. The service, the seats, the food and the treatment of the personnel were excellent. I highly recommend it.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Good airline with good staff. If u book much in advance then the prices are reasonable too and it is a good alternative to the ferries to the islands. The ferries can be unpredictable due to weather and also takes a lot more time. So if u are travelling from Athens to the Islands or Islands to Athens, then booking...
quotes: Good airline for Travelling within Greece

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: We were initially impressed with the inflight service on our flights to Heraklion from London via Athens on 31st December. We had also booked a return to London from Heraklion for Monday 14th January but for several reasons purchased new tickets for earlier flight from Heraklion to Athens. It now appears that we are unable to use the Athens London...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: We travelled to Athens. Exquisite service. We were given lunch on board like the old times. Highly recommended

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: National carriers are normally comfortable with respect to generous check-in luggages, onboard dining and comfortable seats. Aegan airlines does not disappoint. Take-off and Landing is also smooth and perfect. For those travelling from non-schengan country to another non-schengan country, process at Athens airport is very simple - get down from the plane and the frist gate on the left is...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: I chose this airline because of it's good reputation, and it didn't let me down. Al flights were on time, the hostesses very kind, during checking in give priority to families with young children. They always treat passengers with caramels as soon as they take seat, and with a juice or coffe during the flight. It is one of the...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review:
I only took 2 flights on my trip in Europe, and the first was a nightmarish experience so this review would be written partly in comparison to that. My first flight was with Wizz Air, from Athens to Budapest, and my second flight is this one, from Venice to Athens.
A couple of days before the flight, Aegean Air sent...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Being afraid of planes and flying i must admit it's actually the only airlines i feel safer. I choose to take the plane from Lca instead of pfo and fly with Aegean because it gives me the feeling of security. Overall smooth flights with good service. i liked a lot the entertainment on the plane with aegean stream! Just a...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Aegean definetly knows how make customers satisfied. Flight was on time. Great service from cabin crew. Tasty snacks and pommegranate as a gift for traditional New Year celebration :)

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Check in was efficient. I had purchased extra baggage online which was very convenient for me. Flight took off on time and was very smooth. Flight attendants were very friendly and cooperative. Aircraft was clean, and legroom was ok. Will travel again with Aegean airlines.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: The flight was overall good. The flight attendants and the crew overall were very kind and patient. The food served (breakfast) was ok. Coffee actually quite good

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Despite the good service onboard and the comfort I can't recommend Aegean Airlines. Both the flight from Amman to Athens and the following one to Rome took off about one hour late. It's the only experience I had with them buy with this result I cannot be satisfied.
quotes: Two delayed flights out of two

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Being bused to the plane was a new experience for us, a long wait once we boarded service on board was good keep carry on luggage to a minimum the plane was full and not enough room for luggage. Short flight, good service when we arrived at airport very easy to find luggage, baggage handlers were rough with bags we...
quotes: Easy booking in, great on board service

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Finally, comfortable seats on moderate prices. In addition, warm food was served for breakfast. The pilot also landed without bouncing the plane on the runway.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: For a busy flight it was managed well without any major issues. The food on the way out was pretty awful though so I would recommend bringing your own. No inflight entertainment but it's not a long flight so would not have expected it.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Great airline, good service, excellent crews. Always a pleasure flying Aegean Airlines when I'm in Greece. Planes (jet) look new, prop planes tend to be a bit weathered. In any case, crews are always extremely professional and courteous. When island hopping noting beats them, including the long ferries.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: I flew on Aegean from Athens to Cairo--a direct flight--and when I arrived in Cairo I received a text informing me that my bag did not arrive in Cairo with me. When I checked my bag that morning 2.5 hours before my flight was scheduled to depart, the rude airline employee put my bag on the conveyor belt after tagging...

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: From the city to the airport to the lounge to the gate to the first welcome to the welcoming smile to the smooth ride to the arrival on time. :)

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: Flight Attendants go above and beyond serving meals and drinks on this short flight. It's like a party all the way.

name: Aegean Airlines
text_review: It's a mixed bag for Aegean - while the check in was one of the easiest and friendliest I have ever experienced, finding out that your flight to Athens was delayed due to a late incoming flight tinged that joy with a little dismay. The incoming flight had been delayed due to offloading of unaccompanied baggage in Athens, which kinda...
